text:
對您的影響
我們已更新《服務條款》以反映這些變更，並將於 2025 年 1 月 1 日開始生效。 若在該日期後繼續使用我們產品或您收到的服務，即表示您同意更新後的《服務條款》。
深入瞭解若不同意更新後的《服務條款》，您可以有哪些選擇。
感謝使用我們的服務，
Meta Platforms
這則訊息依你的要求送到[redacted_email] 。
trans:
How This Affects You
We have updated our Terms of Service to reflect these changes, and they will take effect on January 1, 2025. By continuing to use our products or services after that date, you agree to the updated Terms of Service.
Learn more about your options if you choose not to agree to the updated Terms of Service.
Thank you for using our services,
Meta Platforms
This message was sent to [redacted_email] at your request.
